title: Print, "Ruins of the Mausoleum of Octavian Augustus, "Le Antichita Romane"  II, 1756", 1756
inscribed: Lengthy inscription etched across lower part of plate
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Collection of architectural and sculptural fragmets.  A capitol on a carved socle, with an inset bust, an obelisk and a base bearing the inscription: "OSSA / AGRIPPINAE .M. AGRIPPA..." A small tree between the obelisk and the base.  Behind, a large circular structure, at a different scale.  Below, eight line inscription.  Inscribed, lower right: Piranesi Archit. dis.et inc.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Ruins of the Mausoleum of Octavian Augustus, "Le Antichita Romane"  II, 1756", 1756.
1756. Etching. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-94-85.
